actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain farmers to obtain the investment credit for used section 38 property acquired from a related party.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit farmers to obtain the investment tax credit for certain types of business property acquired from a related party.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain farmers to obtain the investment credit for used section 38 property acquired from a related party.
